it.cnr.isti.wnlab.indoornavigation.android.app.localization

Class SimpleIndoorService

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.Context
      • android.content.ContextWrapper
        • android.app.Service
          • it.cnr.isti.wnlab.indoornavigation.android.app.localization.SimpleIndoorService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, Observer<IndoorPosition>

    public class SimpleIndoorService
extends android.app.Service
implements Observer<IndoorPosition>
    In the MVC view this service implements the model and some controllers.

    Firstly there is the service code. Then, there is the logic divided in: 1) Initialization (of data structures and components) 2) Start (Note that the registration of this to the strategy actually starts everything) 3) Stop (The cancellation of this observer to position updates)
